activities.name: Easter Markets at Republic Square
activities.description: Traditional Easter markets in Republic Square featuring local crafts, painted eggs, traditional Czech Easter decorations, and seasonal treats like mazanec (Easter bread).
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings the traditional Czech Easter celebrations with markets showcasing local crafts and seasonal foods.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early morning for the best selection of handcrafted Easter decorations and traditional foods.

activities.name: Cathedral Tower Climb
activities.description: Climb the 102.6-meter tower of St. Bartholomew's Cathedral for panoramic views of Plzen and the surrounding countryside in spring bloom.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers the best weather for climbing the tower with comfortable temperatures and clear views.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to avoid crowds and bring a camera for stunning spring landscape photos.

activities.name: Brewery Spring Tour
activities.description: Special spring brewery tours at Pilsner Urquell featuring seasonal beer varieties and the brewing process in full swing.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is when the brewery ramps up production, making it an ideal time to see the brewing process in action.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance, especially during peak spring tourist season.

activities.name: Spring Beer Garden Opening
activities.description: Celebrate the opening of outdoor beer gardens throughout Plzen, featuring fresh Pilsner Urquell and traditional Czech pub food.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring marks the return of outdoor dining with pleasant temperatures perfect for beer garden enjoyment.
activities.booking_tips: Visit popular beer gardens like Republic Square Beer Garden early to secure a good spot.

activities.name: Historic Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore Plzen's medieval Old Town and historic architecture with guided walking tours highlighting the city's 13th-century foundation.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring weather is ideal for walking tours with comfortable temperatures and blooming flowers.
activities.booking_tips: Wear comfortable shoes and bring water for the walking tour through historic streets.

activities.name: Spring Market at Republic Square
activities.description: Visit the traditional spring market offering fresh local produce, seasonal flowers, and traditional Czech crafts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring markets feature fresh seasonal produce and traditional Czech Easter decorations.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early for the best selection of fresh produce and handcrafted items.

activities.name: Café Louvre Spring Experience
activities.description: Enjoy traditional Czech coffee and pastries at the historic Café Louvre, where Einstein and Kafka once met, in the pleasant spring atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is perfect for enjoying the historic café's terrace and traditional Czech coffee culture.
activities.booking_tips: Try the traditional Czech coffee preparation and seasonal pastries.

activities.name: Underground Beer Tunnels Tour
activities.description: Explore the 9-kilometer network of historic underground beer tunnels used for beer storage and maturation beneath Plzen.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring tours offer comfortable underground temperatures and fewer crowds than peak summer season.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance and wear comfortable walking shoes for the underground exploration.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Cooking Workshop
activities.description: Learn to cook traditional Czech spring dishes like Easter bread (mazanec) and seasonal Czech specialties with local ingredients.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring provides fresh seasonal ingredients perfect for learning traditional Czech cooking techniques.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve your spot at least two weeks in advance for popular cooking workshops.

activities.name: Pilsner Urquell Brewery Summer Festival
activities.description: Annual summer beer festival celebrating Pilsner Urquell with live music, beer tastings, traditional Czech food, and brewery tours.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is peak beer festival season with perfect weather for outdoor celebrations and beer tasting.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase festival tickets in advance and arrive early to enjoy all activities.

activities.name: Republic Square Beer Garden
activities.description: Enjoy Pilsner Urquell and local craft beers in the outdoor beer garden at Republic Square with live music and traditional Czech pub food.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for outdoor beer garden enjoyment with pleasant temperatures and lively atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to secure a good table, especially on weekends and during live music events.

activities.name: Plzen Historical Center Night Tour
activities.description: Explore Plzen's historic center by night with guided tours highlighting the medieval architecture and illuminated landmarks.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer nights offer pleasant temperatures for evening walking tours with beautiful illuminated architecture.
activities.booking_tips: Book evening tours in advance and bring a camera for stunning night photography.

activities.name: Outdoor Cinema at Republic Square
activities.description: Enjoy classic Czech films and international movies under the stars at Republic Square's outdoor cinema during summer evenings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are ideal for outdoor cinema with warm temperatures and late sunsets.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a blanket or portable chair and arrive early to secure a good viewing spot.

activities.name: Plzen Food and Beer Tour
activities.description: Comprehensive food and beer tour visiting traditional Czech restaurants, breweries, and local markets with beer pairings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers the best weather for food tours with outdoor dining options and fresh seasonal ingredients.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance, especially for weekend slots, and come hungry for the full experience.

activities.name: Cycling Around Plzen
activities.description: Rent a bike and explore Plzen's historic center and surrounding areas, including routes to nearby parks and the brewery district.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides ideal cycling weather with long daylight hours and pleasant temperatures.
activities.booking_tips: Use local bike rental services and follow designated cycling routes for the best experience.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Pub Crawl
activities.description: Experience Plzen's traditional pub culture with a guided pub crawl visiting historic pubs and tasting different Czech beers.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for pub crawls with a lively atmosphere and comfortable temperatures.
activities.booking_tips: Join organized pub crawls for the best experience and to learn about Czech beer culture.

activities.name: Plzen Market Shopping
activities.description: Explore the traditional Plzen market for fresh summer produce, local crafts, and traditional Czech foods in the bustling market atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer markets feature fresh seasonal produce and local specialties perfect for picnics and cooking.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early morning for the freshest produce and to avoid crowds.

activities.name: Brewery Restaurant Dining
activities.description: Dine at Na Spilce restaurant in the Pilsner Urquell Brewery with beer-braised dishes and fresh Pilsner Urquell in the historic brewery setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers the opportunity to enjoy brewery dining with seasonal beer varieties and outdoor seating options.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve a table in advance, especially for dinner, and try the brewery's seasonal beer offerings.

activities.name: Plzen Beer Festival
activities.description: Annual autumn beer festival celebrating Czech beer culture with tastings, traditional music, and local food specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is harvest season, making it the perfect time for beer festivals celebrating Czech brewing traditions.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase festival tickets in advance and plan to spend the full day enjoying the festivities.

activities.name: Historic Architecture Photography
activities.description: Capture Plzen's medieval and Renaissance architecture in beautiful autumn light, including the Gothic cathedral and historic town hall.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn provides the best lighting for architectural photography with golden hour and dramatic skies.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a tripod for architectural photography and visit during golden hour for the best lighting.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to cook traditional Czech autumn dishes like goulash, svíčková, and seasonal specialties using local ingredients.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's harvest provides abundant ingredients for learning traditional Czech cooking techniques.
activities.booking_tips: Book classes in advance, especially for popular autumn cooking workshops focusing on seasonal dishes.

activities.name: Brewery Museum Visit
activities.description: Explore the comprehensive brewery museum showcasing the history of beer brewing in Plzen and the revolutionary Pilsner lager.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's cooler weather makes museums an ideal choice for cultural enrichment and learning about beer history.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues and consider a guided tour for deeper insights into brewing history.

activities.name: Autumn Market at Republic Square
activities.description: Visit the autumn market featuring seasonal produce, traditional Czech crafts, and harvest specialties in the historic square.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn markets showcase harvest produce and traditional Czech seasonal foods and crafts.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early for the best selection of fresh autumn produce and traditional crafts.

activities.name: Wine Tasting in Plzen
activities.description: Discover Czech wines with tastings at local wine bars and restaurants, featuring wines from the nearby Moravia region.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is harvest season in Czech wine regions, making it an ideal time for wine tasting and appreciation.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve spots at popular wine bars and ask for recommendations of local Czech wines.

activities.name: Historic Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore Plzen's medieval streets and historic sites with guided tours highlighting the city's rich history and architecture.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers comfortable temperatures for walking tours with beautiful fall colors enhancing the historic atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance and wear comfortable walking shoes for exploring the medieval streets.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Pub Experience
activities.description: Experience authentic Czech pub culture at traditional establishments like U Mansfelda and U Salzmannů with local beer and traditional dishes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn evenings are perfect for cozy pub experiences with traditional Czech comfort food and beer.
activities.booking_tips: Visit during off-peak hours for a more authentic experience and try traditional Czech pub dishes.

activities.name: Plzen Cultural Events
activities.description: Attend autumn cultural events including classical concerts, theater performances, and art exhibitions throughout Plzen.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is a rich cultural season with various performances and exhibitions celebrating Czech arts and culture.
activities.booking_tips: Check local event calendars and book tickets in advance for popular cultural events.

activities.name: Christmas Markets at Republic Square
activities.description: Magical Christmas markets featuring traditional Czech crafts, mulled wine, trdelník pastries, and festive decorations in the historic square.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter Christmas markets are a quintessential Czech holiday experience with traditional crafts and seasonal treats.
activities.booking_tips: Visit in the evening for the best atmosphere with festive lights and fewer crowds.

activities.name: Cathedral Christmas Concerts
activities.description: Experience classical music concerts in the stunning St. Bartholomew's Cathedral featuring traditional Christmas carols and classical performances.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter evenings are perfect for indoor concerts in the historic cathedral setting with beautiful acoustics.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets well in advance as Christmas concerts often sell out quickly.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Christmas Dinner
activities.description: Enjoy traditional Czech Christmas dinner featuring carp, potato salad, and Christmas cookies at local restaurants and pubs.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the season for traditional Czech Christmas cuisine with hearty dishes and festive atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve tables in advance for Christmas dinner, especially at popular traditional restaurants.

activities.name: Brewery Winter Tour
activities.description: Special winter brewery tours at Pilsner Urquell featuring the brewing process and warm beer tastings in the historic brewery setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers a cozy atmosphere for brewery tours with warm indoor tastings and fewer crowds.
activities.booking_tips: Book winter tours in advance and dress warmly for the outdoor portions of the tour.

activities.name: Hot Chocolate at Café Louvre
activities.description: Warm up with traditional Czech hot chocolate and pastries at the historic Café Louvre in the cozy winter atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is perfect for enjoying warm beverages and traditional Czech café culture in historic settings.
activities.booking_tips: Visit during off-peak times to avoid crowds and try the traditional Czech hot chocolate preparation.

activities.name: Plzen Historical Museum Visit
activities.description: Explore the Plzen Historical Museum showcasing the city's rich history, medieval artifacts, and cultural heritage in a warm indoor setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter's cold makes museums an ideal choice for cultural enrichment and learning about Plzen's history.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues and consider a guided tour for deeper historical insights.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Pub Winter Experience
activities.description: Experience cozy Czech pub atmosphere with traditional winter dishes like goulash, roasted pork knee, and warm Czech beer.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter evenings are perfect for cozy pub experiences with hearty Czech comfort food and warm beer.
activities.booking_tips: Visit traditional pubs like U Mansfelda for authentic Czech winter dining experience.

activities.name: New Year's Eve Celebrations
activities.description: Celebrate New Year's Eve at Republic Square with fireworks, live music, and festive atmosphere in the heart of Plzen.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter New Year's celebrations offer a magical atmosphere with fireworks and festive gatherings.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to secure a good viewing spot for the fireworks and dress warmly for outdoor celebrations.

activities.name: Winter Beer Tasting
activities.description: Sample seasonal winter beers and traditional Czech spirits like Becherovka at local pubs and breweries.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is ideal for beer tasting with seasonal varieties and warm indoor pub atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Visit popular beer bars and ask for seasonal winter beer recommendations from local bartenders.
